stem.zh: 我喜欢修理或组装器械
stem.en: I like fixing or assembling things

stem.zh: 我喜欢在实验室或通过研究找答案
stem.en: I enjoy research/experiments to find answers

stem.zh: 我喜欢写作、绘画或表演
stem.en: I like writing, drawing or performing

stem.zh: 我喜欢帮助他人解决问题
stem.en: I enjoy helping people solve problems

stem.zh: 我喜欢带领团队、做决定
stem.en: I like leading teams and making decisions

stem.zh: 我喜欢处理数据、表格和细节
stem.en: I like working with data, tables and details

stem.zh: 我喜欢户外或动手的活动
stem.en: I enjoy outdoor or hands-on activities

stem.zh: 我喜欢分析现象并提出假设
stem.en: I enjoy analyzing phenomena and hypothesizing

stem.zh: 我常常有独特的点子和创意
stem.en: I often have unique ideas and creativity

stem.zh: 我擅长倾听并理解他人感受
stem.en: I listen well and understand others’ feelings

stem.zh: 我乐于说服他人、推进项目
stem.en: I like persuading others and driving projects

stem.zh: 我喜欢有规则与秩序的环境
